Package reso.examples.queueing

Class AppPacketSink

java.lang.Object
reso.common.AbstractApplication
reso.examples.queueing.AppPacketSink
public class AppPacketSink extends AbstractApplication
This class is an application that receives probe packets and collects some statistics such as the packet end-to-end delay and packet count.
See Also:
ProbeMessage, AppPacketSource

    • AppPacketSink

      public AppPacketSink​(IPHost host, MonitorIdMetric<Double> monDelay)
      Creates a new @class AppPacketSink.
      Parameters:
      host - is the IP host on which this application will be running.
      monDelay - is a monitor used to collect the delay of all the received packets.
